message: Let's split 60/40.  A fair starting point for negotiation.
Let's try 55/45. A bit more fair for both of us.
I understand you want a larger share, but so do I. Let's meet in the middle - you get what you offered me last round.

Time is running out! This is a good deal for both of us - I'm willing to compromise for a slightly larger share than you offered last round.
